page.title: 06"GHOSTS" AT MENSTRIE CASTLE
page.content: Menstrie Castle was built in the 16th century. Its renovation in 1957 brought Mr and Mrs Drysdale to live in it. A few months after moving in Mrs Drysdale was woken up by a knocking on the wall. She went downstairs to see if her neighbour needed help but she was fast asleep. The noises continued becoming more frequent over the years and came to an end on the 4th of March 1985. The fact that Mrs Drysdale lived in the castle as a child has not been considered a connection and the Drysdale's idea of someone knocking on the wall outside has not been thought of as an explanation. The noises which happened at No 2, Menstrie Castle have still not been explained.
